product_name: Oakley Fuel Cell Polarized Sunglasses - Men's
long_description: Oakley Fuel Cell sunglasses provide polarized protection, aligned lens curvatures and special optics for visual clarity at all angles of view. Polarized lenses reduce 99% of visible glare from water, snow, sand and pavement for increased visual acuity and decreased eye strain. Optically correct, shatterproof and scratch-resistant Plutonite(R) polycarbonate lenses provide added durability. Oakley High Definition Optics(R) let you see things clearly and sharply, without distortion. Lightweight, flexible nylon frames resist damaging stresses. Unique 3-point fit from Oakley includes optical alignment for sharp accurate vision, impact absorption for improved safety and geometry that extends the peripheral view. Oakley Fuel Cell sunglasses include a specially woven, electrostatic Microclear bag for storage, cleaning and the preservation of optical quality.
short_description: Oakley Fuel Cell sunglasses provide polarized protection, aligned lens curvatures and special optics for visual clarity at all angles of view.
